word_mean: 笃耨香：来自漆树科(Anacardiaceae)笃耨香树(Pistacia terebinthus)，过去是松油脂的来源。松油脂：同turpentin，参见该条

list.abs: and Joshua wrote these words in thethe Law of God And he took a large stone and set up there under the terebinth the sanctuary of the LORD .26约书亚将这些话都写在神的律法书上，又将一块大石头立在橡树下耶和华的圣所旁边。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French therebinte, or via Latin from Greek terebinthos

means.word_mean: 1. a Mediterranean tree yielding Chian turpentine

auth_sentence.content: The vegetation on the trail terebinth and spiny hawthorn was dry and gnarled.
